Package com.hexaware.payxpert.dao

Class EmployeeDao

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.payxpert.dao.EmployeeDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEmployeeDao
public class EmployeeDao extends Object implements IEmployeeDao
The EmployeeDao class provides methods to interact with the database for Employee-related operations, such as creating, retrieving, updating, and removing employee records.
Since:
2024-02-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Praveen Kumar Kuruba
